name: json-ex
author: Gabriel J. Csapo <gabecsapo@gmail.com>
description: Extends JSON to be able to serialize and deserialize more than just basic primitives

scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone JSONex > dist/jsonex.js; cat dist/jsonex.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/jsonex.min.js; browserify -r ./index.js:json-ex > dist/jsonex.require.js; cp dist/jsonex.require.js docs/jsonex.require.js;
